# touchBar

**Instance Property**

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] object associated with the responder.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var touchBar: NSTouchBar? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you have not explicitly provided an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] object for a responder by setting this property, the system sends the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/makeTouchBar()] message to the responder to create the default bar. This property is archived.

## Supporting the Touch Bar

- **makeTouchBar()**: Your custom subclass of the `NSResponder` class should override this method to create and configure your subclass’s default [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] object.
